long_description: The JBL Pulse Portable Speaker transforms your surroundings into a party with high-fidelity, room-filling sound pulsed to preprogrammed light themes, and with easy Bluetooth(R) wireless connection. Wireless speaker with 10-hr. battery, Bluetooth and custom pulsing LED light display. JBL sound with two 5W high-performance drivers and a built-in bass port. Visualizes the tunes you're listening to with programmable, 360deg lighting; built-in LED light show pulses to your music; choose between party and ambient modes. Wireless Bluetooth stereo streaming with NFC (near field communication). Built-in rechargeable lithium-ion battery offers 10 hrs. for music and 5 hrs. for music and lights. The JBL Pulse Portable Speaker features light patterns that are programmable via the touch control panel or JBL app.
short_description: The JBL Pulse Portable Speaker transforms your surroundings into a party with high-fidelity, room-filling sound pulsed to preprogrammed light themes, and with easy Bluetooth(R) wireless connection.
